Translations.Text: Iʙrohim ʙa maloikaho guft: «Ej rasulon, ʙa ci kor omadaed?»
Guftand: «Mo haroina, ʙa sui mardumi taʙahkor firistoda sudaem
to porahoi sanghoi gili ʙar sarason ʙiʙorem, halokason sozem
ki ʙar on sangho az coniʙi Parvardigorat ʙaroi az had guzastaho (dar gunoh) nisonae guzosta sudaast»
Pas, hamai kasonero, ki dar on co imon ovarda ʙudand, az dijori qavmi Lut ʙerun ovardem
Va dar on sahr cuz jak xonai digare az farmonʙardoron najoftem. Va on xonai Lut alajhissalom ʙud, magar hamsaras, ki u az halokjoftagon ʙud
Va dar on sarzamin ʙaroi kasone, ki az azoʙi dardovar metarsand, nisone, ki dalolat ʙar haloki kuffor ast, ʙoqi guzostem
Va dar qissai Muso, ʙaroi kasone, ki az azoʙi dardnok metarsand, nisonae qaror dodem, on goh ki uro ʙo dalelhoi oskor (ʙo mu'cizahoi ravsan) nazdi Fir'avn firistodem
Va Fir'avn ʙa hamai nerujas ruj gardondu guft: In Muso: «Codugarest jo devonae!»
Pas Fir'avn va laskarhojasro furu giriftem va ʙa ʙahr andoxtem. Va u ʙa saʙaʙi kufru inkori haq sazovori malomat ʙud
Va niz ʙaroi andesakunandagon iʙratest dar halok sudani qavmi Od, cun ʙodi aqimro ʙar onho firistodem
Ba har cize ki mevazid, onro ʙoqi nameguzost, magar ki onro cun ustuxoni pusida megardond
Va niz pandu iʙratest dar halok sudani qavmi Samud, cun ʙa onho gufta sud: «Zamone cand to ʙa oxir rasidani umraton ʙahra ʙared»
Pas onon az farmoni Parvardigorason sar toftand va hamcunon ki ʙo casmi sar menigaristand, ra'di tunde onhoro furu girift
Pas na tavoni gurextan va na tavoni ʙa po istodan dostand va na intiqomgiranda ʙudand, to xudro kumak kunand
Va pes az on guruh qavmi Nuhro halok soxta ʙudem, zero onho qavmi fosiqe ʙudand
Va ammo osmonro ʙo quvvat va qudrati azim ʙino kardem va onro saqfe ʙaroi zamin qaror dodem va haqqo, ki Mo ʙar pahnovarii kanorhoi on tavonoem
Va zaminro pahn kardaem va ʙaroi zindagii mardumon omoda soxtaem, pas ci omodakunandagoni xuʙe hastem
Va az har (mavcudot) ciz cufte ʙijofaridaem, ʙosad, ki az qudrati ilohi iʙrat gired

Pas Pajomʙar gujad: Ej mardum az azoʙi Alloh, ʙa sui rahmati Alloh ʙa vasilai imon ovardan ʙa Allohu rasulas va ʙa pajravi namudanu amal kardan ʙa farmonas ʙigrezed. Haroina, man sumoro az coniʙi u ʙimdihandae oskoram
Va ʙo Allohi jakto ma'ʙudi digarero maparasted. Haroina, man sumoro az coniʙi u ʙimdihandae oskoram
Hamin guna, ki qurajsiho pajomʙarason Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallamro duruƣ meʙarorand, hec pajomʙare ʙa sui mardumoni pes az onho najomad, magar in guftand: «U codugar jo devonaest»

Ojo ʙa guzastagon va ojandagon duruƣ ʙarovardani pajomʙaronro ʙo jakdigar vasijat karda ʙudand? Na! Balki, onho mardumi sarkase ʙudand, ki dilho va amalhojason dar kufr varzidan va sarkasi kardan monandi jakdigarast. Pas ojandagonson cunin guftaand, cunon ki guzastagonason guftaand
Pas, ej Rasul, az musrikon ruj ʙigardon, to farmoni Alloh dar haqqi onho ʙa tu nozil gardad. Kase turo malomat naxohad kard, zero on ciro, ki ʙar uhdai tu ʙud, ʙa oxir rasonidai
Va pand deh, ʙa rosti ki pand dodan ʙa mu'minon foidae meʙaxsad
Va cinnu odamiro najofaridaam, magar ʙaroi (hadafi ʙuzurge, to tanho) maro iʙodat kunand, (na ƣajri Maro)
Az onho rizqe namexoham va namexoham, ki maro ta'om dihand. (Alloh ta'olo xud ehtijoc ʙa xalq nadorad, ʙalki onho hama ʙa U ehtijocmandand. U ofaridagor va ruzidihandai onhost va az onho ʙenijoz ast)
Haroina, Alloh ʙaroi ʙandagonas ruzidihandaast. Va Ust sohiʙi tamomi nerui saxti ustuvor
Pas, haroina, ʙaroi kasone, ki sitam kardaand, az azoʙ nasiʙaest monandi nasiʙae, ki joronason dostand. Pas, naʙojad, ki ʙa sitoʙ az man azoʙ talaʙ kunand! Begumon on omadanist
Voj (va haloki ʙod) ʙar onon, ki kufr varzidand ʙa Allohu rasulas, az on ruz, ki onho ʙa furud omadani azoʙ va'da doda mesavand! Va on ruz ruzi qijomat ast
Va Alloh ta'olo savgand jod mekunad: Savgand ʙa kuhi Tur
Va savgand ʙa kitoʙi navistasuda
dar sahifahoi kusodasuda navista sudaast, ki ʙar hec oqil va ʙinandae pusida nest
Va savgand ʙa Bajtulma'mur, ki dar osmon ast va maloikahoi kirom doim dar girdi on tavof mekunand
Va savgand ʙa saqfi ʙarafrosta va on osmoni dunjo ast
Va savgand ʙa darjoi purkardasuda
Begumon (ej Pajomʙar), azoʙi Parvardigorat, ʙar kofiron hatman voqe' sudanist
Va onro hangomi voqe' sudanas daf'kunandae nest
Ruze ki osmon saxt takon xurad ʙa takon xurdani saxt, pas nizomi on vajron va aczojas pora pora savad va dar on vaqt hajoti dunjo ʙa oxir rasad
Va dar on ruz kuhho az coi xud kanda zud ravon savand, misli aʙrhoe, ki ravon mesavand
Pas voj, (haloki ʙod) dar on ruz ʙar duruƣʙarorandagon
kasone, ki dar ʙehudagui masƣuland va dinasonro ʙa ʙoziju ʙehudagi ivaz mekunand
Ruze, ki onhoro ʙa qahr va saxti ʙa coniʙi cahannam ravona kunand
Ba onho az rui sarzanis gufta savad: In ast on otase, ki dar dunjo duruƣas mesumurded
Ojo in cize, ki ham aknun meʙined va musohida mekuned (az azoʙ), codu ast jo sumo nameʙined

Ba otas daroed. Xoh ʙar azoʙi on saʙr kuned jo saʙr nakuned, ʙaroʙar ast ʙar sumo, pas hargiz az sumo azoʙro saʙuk karda namesavad va hargiz az on ʙerun nameoed. Haroina, sumo dar ʙaroʙari korhoe, ki dar dunjo mekardaed, cazo doda mesaved
Haroina, parhezgoron dar ʙihistho va nozu ne'mat xohand ʙud
Xusholsuda ʙa saʙaʙi on ki onhoro Parvardigorason ne'mat dod va onhoro az azoʙi duzax nigoh dost
Bixuredu ʙinused az ta'omu saroʙho xusu guvoro ʙa saʙaʙi a'moli neke, ki dar dunjo ancom medoded
Bar on taxthoi kanori ham cida takja mezanand va xonador kunem onhoro ʙo huroni zeʙoju sahlocasm

Kasone, ki xud imon ovarda va farzandonason dar imon pajravijason kardand, farzandonasonro ʙo onho dar cannat ʙirasonem va az on podosi amalason hec kam nakunem, har kas dar garavi koru kirdori xestan ast va gunohi kasero ʙar dusi xud namegirad
Va paji ham ato kunem (zijoda kunem) ʙa ahli cannat, az meva va gust har nav'e, ki mexohand
Dar cannat az dasti jakdigar pijolavu comhoi saroʙro megirand, ki ʙa'di nusidani on saroʙ na ʙehudaguie ʙosad va na gunohe
Va ʙarojason navcavonone hastand, ki xussuratu pokiza va safedruj gujo misli gavharand dar doxili sadaf, ʙar girdogirdi onho ʙihistijon megardand va ʙa xidmati onho omodaand
Va ahli cannat ru ʙa jakdigar ruj ovarda va az holi guzastai jakdigar mepursand; ki ci ranchoe didaand
Gujand: «Alʙatta mo pes az in dar dunjo, dar mijoni xonadoni xud (az azoʙi ilohi) tarson ʙudem
Pas, Alloh ʙar mo minnat nihod, (ja'ne, hidojat va tavfiq dod) va moro az azoʙi samum nigah dost

Haroina, mo pes az in Uro ʙa jagonagi mexondem va Uro parastis mekardem va az U mepursidem, moro az azoʙi samum nigah dorad va ʙa saroi ne'mat ʙirasonad, pas duojamonro qaʙul va hocathojamonro ʙaroʙar kard, ki alʙatta, U ehsonkunandavu mehruʙon ast!» (Va az cumlai neki va mehruʙonias ʙa mo in ast, ki az mo xusnud gardid va moro voridi ʙihist gardond va az noxusnudii xes va azoʙi cahannam nacot dod)
Pas, ej Rasul, pand deh insonhoro ʙa ojathoi Qur'on, zero tu ʙa fazlu marhamati Alloh kohin (ƣajʙguvu) devona nesti! Cunonki kofiron in guna nisʙathoi duruƣro ʙar tu mezanand
Jo musrikon megujand turo ej Rasul: «U soir ast, muntaziri margi u hastem»
Bigu ʙarojason: Sumo muntaziri margi man ʙimoned, ki haroina, man niz azoʙi sumoro intizori mekasam. Va zud ast, ki meʙined oqiʙati kor az oni kist
Ojo musrikonro aqlhojason ʙa in suxanhoi mutanoqiz amr mekunad. Jo ki onho xud qavmi tacovuzkor hastand
Jo, ki musrikon megujand: Qur'onro Muhammad az pesi xud ʙoftaast! Balki, onho imon nameovarand! Pas agar imon meovardand, cunin suxanhoro nameguftand
Pas, suxane monandi Qur'on ʙijovarand, agar rostguj ʙosand dar da'vohojason, (ki Muhammad onro az nazdi xud ʙoftaast)

Ojo in musrikon ʙe hec ofaridagore xalq karda sudaand jo ki xudason ofaridagorand? Hardu ehtimolot ʙotil va nomumkin meʙosand. Pas mu'ajjan sud, ki Alloh ta'olo xud onhoro xalq kardaast va U jagona sazovori iʙodat ast
Ojo osmonhovu zaminro xalq kardaand? Na! Balki, onho ʙovari ʙa azoʙi Alloh nadorand, pas onho musrikand
Ojo xazinahoi Parvardigorat nazdi onhost har guna, ki xohand dar on tasarruf mekunand, jo ki onho ƣoliʙu purquvvat hastand ʙar maxluqhoi Alloh? Na! hargiz cunin nest, ʙalki onho ocizu notavon hastand

Ojo nardʙone dorand, ki ʙa vositai on ʙa sui osmon ʙaromada asrori vahjro mesunavand? Pas ʙojad sunavandai onho ʙar in da'vo dalelu huccati ravsanero ʙijorad, ki gujo dar haqiqat xaʙardor ast az amri Alloh
Ojo Allohro duxtaron astu sumoro pisaron cunonki da'voi duruƣ mekuned
Ojo tu ej Pajomʙar az musrikon muzde metalaʙi ʙaroi taʙliƣi risolat, pas onho az dodani on muzd masaqqat mekasand

Jo ilmi ƣajʙ pesi onhost, pas onho har ci ʙixohand menavisand onro ʙaroi odamon va xaʙardorason mekunand? Ne, incunin nest, pas ʙa durusti namedonad hec kas ilmi ƣajʙro dar zaminu osmonho, magar Alloh
Jo mexohand ʙa Rasulalloh va mu'minon hillae kunand? Pas onhoe, ki kofirand, ʙarmegardad hillaason ʙa xudason
Jo onhoro ma'ʙudest, ki sazovori iʙodat ast ƣajr az Allohi ʙarhaq? Pok ast Alloh az har ci sarikas mesozand, pas nest Uro sarik dar podsohii U va na dar jagonagii U va na dar iʙodati U

Va agar musrikon, porae az aʙrro az osmon, ʙaroi azoʙason aftoda ʙuʙinand, ʙoz ham az kufri xud ʙoz nameistand, ʙalki megujand: In aʙrest ʙar rui ham nisastaast va az nisonahoe, ki meʙinand, iʙrat namegirand
Pas, ej Pajomʙar musrikonro ʙa holi xud voguzor, to ʙa on ruze ʙirasand, ki dar on ruz az saxtii on ʙehus mesavand va on ruz qijomat ast
Ruze, ki najrangason cize az azoʙi Allohro az onon dur namekunad va ʙa onho madadu jori doda namesavad
Va haroina, ʙaroi kasone, ki sitam mekunand, azoʙest dar dunjo pes az omadani azoʙi qijomat, vale ʙestarinason namedonand

Va ej Pajomʙar dar ʙaroʙari ozoru azijati kofiron ʙa farmoni Parvardigorat saʙr kun. Haroina, tu zeri nazari Mo hasti. Ja'ne, hamesa dar hifzi Mo meʙosi. Va cun az xoʙ ʙarmexezi, ʙo sitoisi Parvardigorat tasʙeh guj
Va dar qisme az saʙ Uro ʙa poki jod kun va niz ʙa'di ƣoiʙ sudani sitoragon dar vaqti sahar ʙa poki jod kun
(Alloh ta'olo savgand jod kardaast:) Savgand ʙa on sitora, ki cun dar oxiri saʙ pinhon savad
Gumroh nasudaast Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam va na ʙa rohi kac raftaast. Balki U xele ham dar rohi durust va i'tidol meʙosad
Va suxan az rui havoju havas namegujad
On cize, ki ʙo xud ovarda va ʙo sumo dar mijon nihodaast, cuz vahj cizi digare nest, ki ʙar u firistoda mesavad
Ta'lim dodaast in Qur'onro ʙa Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam faristae, ki ʙisjor nerumand ast
Pas faristai nerumand doroi axloqi neku (Caʙrail alajhissalom) rost va durust istod
Va u xudro nison dod ʙa surati aslias ʙa Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam dar kanori ʙalandii osmon
Sipas Caʙrail nazdik sud ʙa Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam, ongoh furud omad va nazdiktar sud
pas fosilai u ʙa Pajomʙar ʙa qadri du kamon jo kamtar ʙud
Va Alloh ʙa ʙandai xud Muhammad salallohu alajhi va sallam har ci ʙojad vahj kunad, ʙa vositai Caʙrail, vahj kard
Dili Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam on ciro, ki casmas dida ʙud, duruƣ nasumurd
Ojo ʙo u dar ʙorai cize ki az ojoti Parvardigoras didaast siteza mekunedu duruƣ meʙarored
Va ʙa rosti Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam Caʙrailro ʙa surati haqiqias ʙori digar dida ʙud
nazdi Sidratu-l- muntaho
ki Cannatu-l-ma'voi ʙaroi parhezgoron va'da suda nazdi on qaror dorad
Cun daraxti Sidraro on ci pusonda ʙud, furu pusond, on goh, ki amri ʙuzurg az sui Alloh onro mepusonad, ki vasf va holati onro ƣajri Allohi jakto digare namedonad
Hargiz casmas kacravi nakard na rostu na cap va az on ci ʙa on amr karda suda ʙud ʙa didanas tacovuz nakard
Hamono did Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam, saʙi Me'roc, porae az ojoti ʙuzurg, (ja'ne, cannat va duzaxro, ki dalolat ʙa qudrati Alloh mekunad)
Ojo ej musrikon, on ma'ʙudonero, ki iʙodatason mekuned: Lot va Uzoro didaed
Va Manot, on ʙuti savvumi digarro? Ojo foida jo zarare ovard, to sariki Alloh gardad
Ojo sumoro pisar ʙosad, ki ʙa on rozied va Allohro duxtar, ki dar in surat onro ʙaroi xud rozi nested
In taqsimi sitamkorona ast

In ʙutho cize nestand cuz nomhoe, ki xud va padaronaton az rui havovu havasi ʙotilaton ʙa onho dodaed. Va Alloh ta'olo hec dalele ʙaroi tasdiqi da'voi sumo nafiristodaast. Tanho on musrikon az pai gumonu nafsi xes meravand va hol on ki az coniʙi Alloh ʙar zaʙoni Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam rohnamoijason kardaand, pas ʙa onho foidae nakard
Ojo har ciro, ki odami orzu kunad, az safo'ati in ma'ʙudon jo ƣajras ʙarojas hosil ast? (Hargiz ne)
Ore, ham oxirat va ham dunjo az oni Alloh ast
Va ci ʙisjor faristagoni olihimmat dar osmonand, ki safo'atason hec foidae nadihad, magar az on pas, ki Alloh ʙaroi har kase, ki ʙixohad va pisandad icozat dihad
Haroina, az kofironi araʙ onon, ki ʙa oxirat imon nadorand va ʙaroi on ruz amal namekunand, alʙatta, faristagonro ʙa nomhoi zanona nomguzori mekunand
Va onhoro ʙa on ci megujand, hec donise nest. Tanho az gumoni xud pajravi mekunand va haroina, gumon ʙaroi sinoxti haqiqat kofi nest
Pas, tu niz ruj gardon az kase, ki az suxani Mo (Qur'on) ruj megardonad va cuz zindagii dunjavi cizi digarero namecujad
Nihojati donisason hamin ast. Haroina, Parvardigori tu ʙa on kase, ki az rohi U gumroh mesavad ojo ʙa rohi hidojat (Islom) meravad, donotar ast
Az oni Alloh ast har ci dar osmonhovu har ci dar zamin ast, to ʙadkoronro dar ʙaroʙari a'molason cazo dihad va nekukoronro ʙa kirdori nekason podos (cannat) dihad

Onho kasoneand, ki az gunohoni ʙuzurgu ʙehajogiho parhez mekunand, cuz on ki gunohi xurde az onho sar zanad, ʙidonand, ki haroina, omurzisi Parvardigori tu vase' ast va U ʙa ahvoli sumo on goh ki az zamin ʙijofarid padaraton Odamro va on goh ki dar sikami modaraton pinhon ʙuded, ogohtar ast. Xestanro ʙegunoh nadoned va xudro ta'rif nakuned ʙa parhezgori. U ʙa parhezgoron donotar ast
Ojo didi ej Pajomʙar holi zisti kasero, ki az to'ati Alloh ruj gardonidaast
Va kame az moli xud dodu ʙa'd az on ʙozistod va sangdil sud
Ojo kase, ki az xajr kardani molas ʙoz istod, u ilmi ƣajʙro medonad va hama cizro meʙinad? (Hargiz na, ʙalki in ʙa saʙaʙi mumsiki va saxtdilii ust)
Jo ʙa on ci dar sahifahoi (Tavroti) Muso omada, xaʙar doda nasudaast
Jo az sahifahoi Iʙrohim, ki ʙa on ci amr karda suda ʙud. Iʙrohim ʙa hamaas, vafo kard va rasonid
Jake az muhimtarin ahkome, ki dar sahifahoi Muso va Iʙrohim omadaast, in ast, ki hec kas ʙori gunohi digarero ʙar dus namegirad
Va in ki: ʙaroi mardum podose cuz on ci xud kasʙ kardaand, cizi digare nest
Va tamomi sa'ju kusisi inson dar ruzi qijomat dida mesavad. Va cudo karda mesavad nekihojas az ʙadihojas
Sipas inson cazoi purra doda mesavad ʙar tamomi amalhojas
Va haroina, ej Pajomʙar pojoni rohi ʙozgasti hama ʙa suji Parvardigori tust
Va haroina, U ta'olo kasero, ki xohad dar dunjo mexandonadu xursand mekunad va kasero, ki xohad megirjonadu ƣamgin mesozad
Va haroina, U ta'olo kasero, ki iroda kunad az xalqas memironad va kasero, ki iroda kunad zinda mekunad. (Pas U ta'olo jagonaast dar zinda kardan va mironidan)
Va haroina, U ta'olo, ki cufthoi nar va modaro az inson va hajvonot ofaridaast
az nutfa, on goh ki dar ʙacadoni zan rexta mesavad
Va haroina, ʙar uhdai Ust zinda gardonidani duʙora. Va on dar ruzi qijomat xohad sud
Va haroina, U ta'olost, ki kasero, ki xohad az xalqas, ʙa mol sarvatmand megardonad va onhoro ʙa on rozi megardonad
Va haroina, Ust Parvardigori sitorai Si'ro
Va haroina, Ust, ki Odi naxustin, qavmi Hudro halok kard
Va Samud az qavmi Solehro halok kard va az onho hec ʙoqi naguzost
Va niz pes az onho qavmi Nuhro, ki haroina, sitamkortaru sarkastar ʙudand, halok kard
Va niz sahri Mu'tafikaro (qavmi Lutro) noʙud kard
Pas onhoro ʙa on ci sazovor ʙudand az azoʙi sangin va dardnok pusonid
Pas, ʙa kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigorat ej insoni noʙovar sak mekuni
In Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam ʙimdihandai ʙarhaqest monandi ʙimdihandagoni pesin. Pas pajomʙari navpajdo suda nest
Qijomat nazdik gardidaast. Hec kase ʙa cuz Alloh ta'olo onro daf' karda nametavonad
Kase ʙa cuz Alloh ta'olo oskorkunandai on nest va nadonad vaqti voqe' sudani qijomatro
Ojo ej musrikon, az in Qur'on ta'accuʙ mekuned, ki rost ʙosad
Va masxarakunon ʙa Qur'on mexandedu va az tarsi azoʙ girja namekuned
Va sumo dar ƣaflat mondaed
Pas, Allohro sacda kuned va Uro tanho ʙo ixlos ʙiparasted va tamomi korhojatonro ʙa U taslim kuned
Qijomat nazdik sud va moh ʙa du nim pora gardid

Va agar musrikon mu'cizae ʙuʙinand, ki ʙar sidqi pajomʙarii Rasululloh sallallohu alajhi va sallam dalolat kunad, az imon ovardan ruj ʙigardonand va ʙa'd az in dalelhoi ravsan ʙigujand: In «codui ʙuzurge ast,» ki guzaro va nopojdor ast

Va duruƣ sumurdand kofiron pajomʙarii Rasululloh sallallohu alajhi va sallamro va az pai havoju havashoi xes pajravi kardand. Va har kore, ki dar dunjo ancom mesavad az neku ʙad ʙaroi sohiʙi xud dar ruzi qijomat qarorgohe dorad
Va ʙa tahqiq ʙarojason xaʙarhoe, ki omadaast, az duruƣ ʙarovardani ummatoni pesina pajomʙaroni xudro va muciʙi azoʙ gardidanason, ʙaroi kofironi Qurajs iʙratest ʙozdoranda, ki az kufrason ʙozistand
In Qur'one, ki ʙa nazdason ovarda sud, hikmati raso va ʙasanda ast. Vale ʙimdihandagonro on qavmero, ki az Qur'on ru gardondaand va imon naovardaand foida nadihad
Pas, ej Rasul az onho ruj ʙigardon va to ruzi ʙuzurg muntazir ʙos, ki dar on ruz, ki on da'vatkunanda (Isrofil) ononro ʙa cize noxus faro mexonad va on ruz, ruzi hisoʙu cazo ast
Dar hole ki casmonason xoru zalil ast. Cun malaxhoe parokanda az qaʙrho ʙerun meojand va ʙa sui hisoʙ ʙo sitoʙ meravand
Sarhoro ʙolo girifta ʙa sui on da'vatkunanda (Isrofil) mesitoʙand. Kofiron megujand: «In ruz ʙenihojat ruzi dusvorest!»
Ej Rasul, pes az inho (ja'ne, musrikoni qavmat) qavmi Nuh pajomʙarason Nuhro duruƣ sumorida ʙudand. Pas ʙandai Moro duruƣgu sumorida va guftand: U «devona ast!» «Va ʙo u ʙo durusti raftor sud
Pas Nuh du'o kard ʙa coniʙi Parvardigori xes, ki: «Haroina, man maƣluʙ sudaam va tavoni muqoʙil sudani onhoro nadoram az onho, intiqom ʙigir!»
Pas mo du'ojasro icoʙat kardem va darhoi osmonro ʙa oʙe, ki ʙisjor ʙa siddat rezandaast, kusodem
Va az zamin casmaho sikoftem, sipas oʙ ʙaroi kore, ki muqaddar suda ʙud, faroham omad
Va uro (ja'ne, Nuh va qavmasro) ʙar on kistii az taxtahovu mexho soxta sudaast, savor kardem
Kisti zeri nazari Mo ravon sud. Va takziʙkunandagonro ʙa saʙaʙi kufrason ƣarq kardem. In ʙud cazoi kasone, ki kufr varzidand
Va alʙatta, qissai Nuh ʙo qavmi xud va on kistiro ʙaroi ojandagon nisonae soxtem, to iʙrat va pand ʙigirand. Ojo hec pandgirandae hast az in nisona pandu iʙrat ʙigirad
Pas, azoʙu ʙim dodanhoi Man ci guna ʙud, ʙaroi kasone, ki kufr varzidand va pajomʙaronro duruƣ sumoridand
Va hamono lafzi Qur'onro ʙaroi xondan va hifzi on va andesa namudan va fahmidani ma'nohojas oson kardem, to az on pand girand. Ojo pandgirandae hast

Qavmi Od, ki pajomʙarason Hudro takziʙ kardand, ʙa azoʙ giriftorason kardem. Pas, ʙingared, ki azoʙi Man ʙarojason dar holi kufrason va ʙim dodanihoi Man ʙar duruƣ sumoridani pajomʙaronason ci guna ʙud
Haroina, Mo ʙar onho dar ruzi sum ʙaroi halok namudanason paj dar paj ʙodi sardi saxt firistodem
ʙode, ki mardumonro az zamin ʙarmekand va ʙar sarhojason mahkam ʙar zamin mekuft va sarhojason az ʙadanhojason cudo mesud va gujo, ki onho tanahoi daraxtoni xurmoi az resa ʙarkandae ʙudand
Pas, azoʙi Man ʙarojason dar holi kufrason va ʙim dodanihoi Man ʙar duruƣ sumoridani pajomʙaronason ci guna ʙud? (Ore, azoʙi ʙuzurgu dardnok ʙud)
Ba hamono lafzi Qur'onro ʙaroi xondan, va hifzi on va andesa namudan va fahmidani ma'nohojas oson kardem, to az on pand girand. Ojo pandgirandae hast
Qavmi Samud (ja'ne, qavmi Soleh pajomʙar) ʙimdihandagonro duruƣgu ʙarovardand
Sipas guftand: «Ojo tanho ʙasare az xudamonro pajravi kunem? U jakkavu tanhost va ʙar da'vati xud hec pajravi nadorad, haroina, mo dar in surat gumrohu devona ʙosem
Ojo az mijoni hamai mo kalomi Alloh xos ʙa u nozil sudaast? Balki, u duruƣgui xudpisande ast»
Ba zudi fardo (ja'ne, dar vaqti furud omadani azoʙ dar dunjo va ruzi qijomat onho) xohand donist, ki ci kase durugguji xudpisand ast

Haroina, Mo muvofiqi talaʙotason modasuturro az sang ʙerun ovarandaem va ʙaroi ozmoisi onho firistanda hastem. Pas, ej Soleh to furud omadani azoʙ muntaziri onho ʙos va ʙar da'vati xud va ʙar azijatdodanason turo saʙr kun
Va ʙa onho ʙiguj, ki oʙ mijoni onho va sutur taqsim sudaast. (Ja'ne, ruze navʙati sutur va ruze navʙati onho) navʙati har kadome, ki ʙosad, tanho on sari oʙ meravad
Jorasonro ʙaroi kustani sutur nido dodand, pas u samser ʙargiriftu onro ʙo dasti xud ʙikust
Pas, azoʙi Man ʙarojason dar holati kufrason va ʙim dodanihoi Man ʙaroi kase, ki pajomʙaroni Maro nofarmonʙardori kardaast, ci guna ʙud
Haroina, Mo ʙar onho jak na'rai dahsatnok firistodem. Pas, monandi on alafhoi xuski oƣili cahorpojon sudand
Va hamono lafzi Qur'onro ʙaroi xondan va hifzi on va andesa namudan va fahmidani ma'nohojas oson kardem, to az on pand girand. Ojo pandgirandae hast
Qavmi Lut ʙimdihandagonro duruƣgu ʙarovardand
Haroina, Mo ʙar onho sangʙode firistodem va hamaro halok kardem ƣajri xonadoni Lut, ki onhoro sahargoh (ja'ne, dar oxiri saʙ) nacot dodem
In nacot dodan ne'mate ʙud az coniʙi Mo ʙar Lut va ʙar oli u va ononro, ki sipos gujand, cunin podos medihem
Va haqiqatan Lut onhoro az azoʙi Mo saxt ʙim doda ʙud, vale ʙar sakku gumoni xud ʙa u gus nadodand, ʙalki ʙo ʙimdihandagon ʙa cidol ʙarxostand

Va ʙegumon ʙo Lut dar ʙorai mehmononas (ja'ne, az faristagone, ki ʙa surati mardoni cavon omada ʙudand), suxani ziste guftand. Pas Mo casmonasonro kur gardonidem cizero dida natavonistand. Va ʙarojason gufta sud: Bicased azoʙu ʙimdodanihoi Maro
Va ʙa tahqiq, ʙomdodon azoʙi pojdoru ʙardavom ʙa suroƣason omad
Pas, ʙa saʙaʙi kufru takziʙaton azoʙi Man va ʙimdodanihoi Maro, ki Lut alajhissalom ʙa sumo ʙim karda ʙud, ʙicased
Va hamono lafzi Qur'onro ʙaroi xondan, va hifzi on va andesa namudan va fahmidani ma'nohojas oson kardem, to az on pand girand. Ojo pandgirandae hast
Va ʙa rosti, ʙimdihandagoni azoʙ nazdi xonadoni Fir'avn omadand
Hamai ojoti Moro, ki dalolat ʙar tavhidi Mo va haqiqati pajomʙaronamon mekard, duruƣ sumoridand. On goh Mo niz onhoro azoʙ kardem, cun azoʙ kardani piruzmandi purqudrat

Ej camo'ati Qurajs, ojo kofironi sumo az onho (ja'ne, az kofironi qavmhoi guzasta, ki ʙa saʙaʙi takziʙason halok sudand,) ʙartarand jo dar kitoʙhoi nozilsudai pesina omadaast, ki az azoʙ ilohi dar amon hasted? (Na! Hargiz cunin nest)
Balki kofironi Makka megujand, ki mo hamagi muttahid va sikastnopazir hastem ʙa intiqom ʙarmexezem va hec guruh moro maƣluʙ natavonad kard
Ba zudi on cam' az kofironi Makka nazdi mu'minon sikast xohand xurd va pust gardonda ʙozgardand
Balki va'dagohi onho qijomat ast va ʙa cazoi mustahiq giriftor xohand sud va azoʙi qijomat az azoʙi ruzi Badr saxttaru talxtar ast
Haroina, gunahkoron dar gumrohi va devonagiand
Ruze, ki onhoro ʙa cehrahojason dar cahannam kasand, ʙarojason gufta mesavad: Bicased azoʙi saqarro (duzaxro)
Haroina, Mo har cizro ʙa andoza ofaridaem! (Va ilmi Mo dar on pes raftaast va dar Lavhi Mahfuz saʙt sudaast)
Va farmoni Mo tanho jak farmon ast va on guftani jak kalima ast: "Sav!" pas, mesavad, monandi casm ʙar ham zadan ast
Va kasone, ki monandi sumo dar doirai kufr ʙudand, az ummatoni guzasta alʙatta, onhoro halok kardem. Ojo az in azoʙhoe, ki ʙa onho rasid, pandgirandae hast
Har kore, ki kardaand, az neku ʙad dar daftarhost navista va saʙtsuda ʙo dasti faristagoni ma'mure, ki ʙa in kor amr sudaand
Har kori ʙuzurgu xurde, ki dar dunjo kardaand, dar daftarhoi maxsus navista sudaast va ʙa on cazo doda mesavand
Haroina, parhezgoron ruzi qijomat dar ʙoƣhoi ʙuzurg va cujʙoroni vase'i ʙihist qaror dorand
dar maclisi rostin, ki ʙehudagui va ʙadkori dar on vucud nadorad nazdi podsohi tavono, ki Ofaridgori hamai koinot ast
Allohi mehruʙon
Qur'onro ʙa inson ta'lim dod (va ʙarojas tilovat, hifz va fahmi ma'noi onro oson gardonid)
Insonro ofaridaast
va ʙaroi ʙajon soxtani maqsadas ʙa u suxan guftan omuzondaast, (to az digar maxluqot farq karda savad)
Oftoʙ va mohtoʙ ʙa hisoʙi muajjan (daqiq) dar harakatand
Va sitoragon dar osmon va daraxton dar zamin medonand Parvardigorasonro va sacdaas mekunand. (Va sar furud meorand ʙa amri Xoliqason ʙaroi masolehi ʙandagonas)
Va osmonro ʙoloi zamin ʙarafroxt va dar zamin tarozui adlro muajjan kard (va ʙandagonasro amr kardaast)
to dar tarozu tacovuz (xijonat) makuned
Vazn kardanro ʙa adolat ri'oja kuned va az tarozu mazaned
Va zaminro ʙaroi mardum pahn kard, to dar on cojgir savand
dar on mevahost va daraxtoni doroi ƣilof (pusti) xurmost
Va dar on donahoi ʙargdor va rajhon ast ʙaroi sumo va cahorpojoni sumo
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi dini va dunjavii Parvardigoratonro (ej guruhi cin va insonho) duruƣ mesumored
Alloh ta'olo insonro (Odam alajhis salom) az gili xusksudae cun safol ʙijofarid
Va cin (Iʙlis)-ro az su'lai otas ofarid
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej guruhi cin va insonho) duruƣ mesumored
U suʙhonahu va ta'olo Parvardigori du masriq va du maƣriʙ: (Ja'ne oftoʙ dar fasli zimiston masriqu maƣriʙe dorad va dar toʙiston masriq va maƣriʙi digare dorad. Pas hama zeri tadʙir va xalqijati Ust)
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Du ʙahrro dar ʙaroʙari ham ravona kardaast (sirin va sur), to ʙa ham jakco savand
Mijonason pardaest, to ʙa ham omexta namesavand, (ʙalki sirin, sirin va sur, sur ʙoqi memonad ʙo vucudi jak co ʙudan)
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Az on du ʙahr ʙa qudrati Alloh marvoridu marcon ʙerun meojad
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Va az oni Ust kistihoi ravonsavanda monandi kuh dar ʙahrho
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Har ci ki ʙar rui zamin ast az maxluqot, foni (tamom) sudanist
Va dar oxir rui Parvardigorat, ki sohiʙi ʙuzurgivu in'om ast, ʙoqi memonad
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Mepursand hocathoi xudro az Alloh, har cize, ki dar osmonu zamin ast. Har ruz U dar korest: Aziz mekunad va xor mekunad, medihad va man' mekunad har kasero, ki xohad
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Ba zudi ʙaroi hisoʙu cazoi sumo amalhoe, ki dar dunjo kardaed ej insu cin, mepardozem! Pas gunahgoronro azoʙ mekunem va to'atkoronro savoʙ medihem
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored

Ej guruhi cinnijonu odamijon, agar metavoned, ki ʙigrezed az qazo va qadari U az gusavu kanorahoi osmonhovu zamin, pas ʙigrezed! Vale natavoned gurext, magar ʙo dostani qudrat va huccate az coniʙi Alloh
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Bar sumo su'lae az otas firistoda savad va misi gudoxtasuda ʙar saraton rexta savad, pas, hargiz natavoned jakdigarro jori kard. (Ej guruhi cin va ins)
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Pas cun dar ruzi qijomat osmon ʙisikofad ongoh monandi guli surx, hamcun ravƣan gudoxta savad
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Pas on ruzi qijomat hec inson va cinne az gunohas pursida namesavad, to gunohas ma'lum gardad, zero Alloh ta'olo gunohasonro medonad
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Faristagon gunahkoronro az qijofai cehraason mesinosand va az mui pesi sar va pojhojason megirandu pas ʙa duzax mepartojand
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Ba on gunahkoron (az rui sarzanis va tahqir) gufta savad: In hamon cahannamest, ki gunahkoron dar dunjo duruƣas mepindostand
Bajni on (duzax) va oʙi garmi cuson davr mezanand, goho dar on azoʙ karda mesavand va goho nusonida mesavand az hamim
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Va ʙaroi kase, ki az istodan dar huzuri Parvardigoras tarsidaast, du ʙihist ast
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
In du cannat sohiʙi soxu navdahoi ʙesumorand (ja'ne, sermeva va sersojaand)
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Dar on du cannat, du casmai oʙ corist
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Dar on du cannat az har guna mevae du nav' ast
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored

Va ʙaroi onon, ki az Parvardigorason tarsidand: du cannat ast, ki dar on ʙa nekui zindagi mekunand, takja zada ʙar ʙistarhoe, ki astaras az hariru aʙresimi sof ʙosad va mevahoi on du ʙihist dar nazdikason ʙosand
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Dar on koxho hurone ʙosand casm furusista ki pes az savharonason dar cannat dasti hec inson va cin ʙa onho narasidaast
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Gujo, on huron, (ja'ne hamsaron dar husnu camol) monandi joqutu marcon ʙosand
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Ojo podosi kase, ki dar dunjo amali nek kardaast, cuz neki kardan ʙa ust? Va on neki dar oxirat cannat ast
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Va ƣajri on du ʙihist, ʙoz du ʙihisti digar ast
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
In du cannat saʙz va xurramand, hatto az ƣojati (siddati) saʙzi moil ʙa sijohiand
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Dar on du cannat, du favvorai oʙe ast, ki hec goh oʙas kanda namesavad
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Dar on du ʙihist, mevahoi gunogun va daraxti xurmo va anor hast
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Dar on ʙihistho zanoni neksiratu zeʙoruj hastand
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Huroni nigahdosta dar xajmaho
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) durug mesumored
Dasti hec inson va cin pes az onho dar dunjo ʙa onho narasidaast
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) duruƣ mesumored
Dar hole, ki ʙolisthoi saʙz va ʙistarhoi nekuju zeʙo takja zadaand
Pas, kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigoratonro (ej insu cin) durut mesumored
Bisjor ʙuzurg va purʙarakot ast nomi Parvardigori tu, on sohiʙi ʙuzurgii komil va ikromkunandai dustonas meʙosad
Hangome ki voqe'a ʙarpo savad, (ja'ne, qijomat voqe' savad)
ki voqe' sudani onro jagon kase duruƣgujanda nest
qijomat dusmanoni Allohro dar duzax pastkunandaast va dustoni Allohro dar cannat ʙalandkunanda
On goh ki zamin ʙa saxti ʙilarzad
Va kuhho ʙa purragi reza-reza karda savand
Va cun ƣuʙore dar havo parokanda gardand
Va sumo ej mardum se guruh xohed sud
Pas guruhi rost, sohiʙi cojhoi oliand. Ci xuʙ ast cojgohason
Va guruhi cap, sohiʙi cojhoi pastand. Ci ʙad ast holason
Va pessafon sui xuʙiho dar dunjo, onho pessafon sui daracaho dar oxirat meʙosand. Kasone, ki dar dunjo dar ancom dodani korhoi xuʙ pessafand, dar oxirat pes az hama voridi cannat mesavand
Inho muqarraʙoni dargohi Ilohi hastand, nazdik karda sudagonand dar nazdi Alloh
dar ʙihisthoi purnozu ne'mat xohand ʙud
Doxil mesavad ʙa cannat, guruhe az pesinijoni in ummat va ummatoni digar
Va sumorai andake az pasomadagon hastand
ʙar taxthoi gavharnison xohand nisast
Takjazada ru ʙa ruji jakdigar nisasta ʙosand
Bar girdi onho megardand, ʙaroi xidmati onho pisaroni hamesa cavon, ki pir namesavand va na memirand
Bo qadahhovu kuzaho va comhoe az saroʙe, ki dar cannat corist
ki az nusidani on sardard nasavand va na az hus meravand
Va in xodimon ʙaroi cannatiho ʙijorand har nav' mevaero, ki mexohand
Va gusti parranda, az har nav'e, ki pisandason ʙosad
Va ʙaroi onhost huroni zanoni sahlocasm
monandi marvoridhoe dar sadaf pinhon kardasuda
In hama ne'mathoe, ki ʙarojason doda mesavad, mukofoti amalhoi nekest, ki dar dunjo mekardand
Dar cannat na suxani ʙehuda mesunavand va na harfe, ki guftani on gunoh ʙosad
cuz suxane, ki solim az in ajʙho ʙosad va ʙa jakdigar salom gujand
Va ahli saodat, ci ʙuzurg ast makon va podosi onho
Dar zeri daraxtoni sidri ʙexor
Va daraxtoni mavz (ʙanan), ki mevahojason ʙar jakdigar cida sudaand
Va sojai doimi
Va oʙi cori
Va dar mijoni mevahoi farovon hastand
ki na tamom mesavad va na man' megardad
Va ʙistarhoi ʙaland
Mo ʙijofaridem zanhoi ahli cannatro ƣajri ofarinisie, ki dar dunjo ʙudand, ja'ne, ofarinisi komile, ki noʙud namesavand
Va ononro dusiza (ʙikr) gardonidem
Nazdi savharoni dustdoranda hamsinnu sol
Hamai in ne'matho ʙaroi ahli saodat ast
Guruhi ʙisjore az pesinijonand
Va guruhi zijode az pas omadagonand
Va ahli saqovat, on ʙadʙaxton ci holi ʙade dorand
Dar ʙodi garmi cahannam va oʙi cusonand
dar sojai dudi sijoh
ki in soja na xunuk ʙosad va na ʙoizzat
Hamono ahli duzax, pes az in dar dunjo dar nozu ne'mati harom ʙudand va sarkasi mekardand az on cize, ki pajomʙaron ʙaroi onho ovarda ʙudand
Va hamesa ʙar gunohi ʙuzurg (sirk) mudavomat mekardand. Va nijati tavʙa nadostand az sirku gunoh
Va meguftand on munkironi ruzi qijomat: «Ojo zamone, ki mo murdemu xoku ustuxon sudem, ojo ʙoz mo zinda mesavaem
Ojo padaroni nauxstini mo niz zinda mesavand
Bigu ej Pajomʙar: «Alʙatta, hamaro avvalin va oxirin farzandoni Odam
ʙegumon dar va'dagohi on ruzi muajjan (qijomat) cam' karda savand
Spas sumo, ej gumrohoni rohi hidojat, duruƣsumorandagoni va'da va azoʙi Alloh
hatman az daraxti zaqqum xohed xurd
Va sikamhoi xudro az on pur xohed kard
Va ʙar ʙoloi on oʙi cusone, ki tasnagiro namesikanad, xohed nusid
Va monandi suturoni muʙtalo ʙa ʙemorii tasnagi menused
On cizero, ki ducor mesavand az azoʙ, zijofatest, ki tajjorkarda sudaast ʙaroi onho dar ruzi qijomat
Mo sumoro ej odamon az nesti ʙa hasti ofaridem, pas caro az nav zinda sudanro ʙovar namekuned
Ojo sumo meʙined on ci (oʙi maniro), ki merezoned dar ʙaccadoni zan
Ojo sumo on maniro ʙa surati inson meofarined jo Mo ofarinandaem
Mo muajjan kardem dar mijoni sumo margro va hargiz ociz karda suda nestem
az in, ki taƣjir dihem xalqijati sumoro dar ruzi qijomat. Va sumoro ʙa surate, ki az on ʙexaʙared, az nav ʙijofarinem
Va hamono sumo xuʙ donisted, ki Alloh ta'olo naxustin ʙor sumoro az nesti ofarid, pas caro qudrati Allohro ʙa jod nameored ʙar in, ki u qodir ast sumoro duʙora xalq mekunad
Dar on cize, kist mekuned, andesidaed
Ojo sumo merujonedas az zamin jo Mo rujonandaem
Agar mexostem, haroina on ziro'atro gijohi xusku darhamsikasta megardonidem, ki az on foidae namedided, pas dar in hol, ta'acuʙkunon megued
Alʙatta mo zijonkardavu azoʙkardagonem
ʙalki mo az rizqu ruzi ʙenasiʙ mondagonem
Ojo dar oʙe, ki menused, andesidaed
Ojo sumo onro az aʙr furud ovardaed sui zamin, jo Mo furud orandagonem
Agar mexostem, in oʙro sur megardonidem, ki az on foidae namedided. Pas, caro sukri Parvardigoratonro ʙar furudi in oʙi sirin namegued
Ojo dar otase, ki az soxhoi daraxt meafruzed, andesidaed
Ojo daraxtasro sumo ofaridaed jo Mo ofarinandaem
Mo on otasero, ki meafruzed husdore az duzax va ʙaroi manfi'ati musofironi rohguzar mato'e soxtem
Pas ʙa poki jod kun ej Pajomʙar nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgatro
(Savgand jod karda megujad Alloh ta'olo:) Savgand ʙa cojgohi furu raftani sitoraho dar ƣuruʙgohi osmon
Va in haroina, xele savgandi ʙuzurg ast, agar ʙidoned
Adʙatta, in Qur'one, (ki ʙa Muhammad nozil sudaast,) Qur'oni ʙuzurgu giromiqadr va foidaovar ast
Dar kitoʙe nigah dosta sudaast, ki az casmi xalq pusida ast (va in kitoʙi pinhon Lavhi Mahfuzast, ki dar nazdi Alloh va faristagon manzalati ʙuzurg dorad)

Dast namerasonad ʙa Qur'on, magar faristagoni giromiqadre, ki Alloh ta'olo onhoro az ofatu gunohon pok gardonidaast. (Va incunin dast namerasonad Qur'onro magar kasone, ki pok hastand az sirk, canoʙat va ʙe tahorati)
In Qur'oni karim, nozilsudaast az coniʙi Parvardigori cahonijon. (Pas on haq ast)
Ojo nisʙati in kalom susti va ʙeparvoi mekuned
Va ʙa coi sukri ne'mathoe, ki Alloh ʙa sumo dodaast, sumojon onro duruƣ meʙarored va kofir mesaved
Pas, caro hangome, ki con ʙa hulqum merasad tavonoii ʙozgardonidani onro nadored
Va sumo dar in hangom hozirastedu menigared? (Alʙatta nametavoned)
Va Mo az sumo ʙa u nazdiktarem, vale sumo nameʙined
Pas agar metavoned in ki dar ʙaroʙari a'molaton cazo doda namesaved
agar rost megued, on ruhro ʙoz gardoned. (Hargiz nametavoned)
Pas, cun murda az muqarraʙoni dargohi Ilohi ʙosad
pas ʙaroi ust hangomi margas rahmatu osoisu guli xusʙuj va ʙihisti purne'mat dar oxirat
Va ammo agar murda az joroni rost (ahli sa'odat ʙosad)
pas gufta mesavad ʙa u: Salom va amon ʙod ʙa tu az coniʙi joroni rost (ahli sa'odat)
Va ammo agar murda az duruƣsumorandagoni ʙa'su gumrohoni rohi hidojat ʙosad
pas uro ʙa oʙi garmu cusoni duzax mehmoni kunand
Va sarancomi u daraftodan ʙa duzax ast
Alʙatta in xaʙarhoe, ki ej Pajomʙar ʙa tu zikr kardem, hama rostu durust ast
Pas, ʙa nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgat tasʙeh guj va Uro pok sumor az on ci zolimon megujand
Allohro ʙa poki jod mekunad, har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast az cami'i maxluqotas va U ʙar xalqas piruzmand va dar tadʙiri korason hakim ast
Farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin az oni Ust. Zinda mekunad va memironad va U ʙar har ciz tavonost. On ci xost sud va on ci naxost nasud

Ust avvalin pes az hama ciz va Ust oxirin ʙa'd az hama ciz va Ust oskor pajdo ast, ki ʙolotar az U cize nest va Ust pinhon nopajdo ast, ki pinhontar az U cize nest va U ʙa hama ciz donost. Va cize dar osmon va zamin ʙar U pusida namemonad

Ust, ki osmonhovu zaminro va on ci mijoni onhost dar sas ruz ofarid. Sipas ʙa arsi Xud va ʙoloi hamai xalqas istivo joft. Har cizero, ki dar zamin furu meravad az dona va ʙoron va cizero, ki az zamin ʙerun meojad az naʙotot va ziroatho va har cizero, ki az osmon furu meojad az ʙoron va har cizero, ki ʙa osmon ʙolo meravad, az faristagon va amalhoi ʙandagon medonad. Va har co, ki ʙosed, ʙo ilmi Xud hamrohi sumost va ʙa har kore, ki mekuned, ʙinost va ʙar on amalhoi neke, ki mekuned sumoro podos medihad
Farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin az oni Ust va hamai korho ʙa sui Alloh ʙoz megardad va muvofiqi amalhojason ʙandagonasro podos medihad
Saʙro az vaqtas kam karda dar ruz doxil mekunad va ruzro meafzojad va ruzro az vaqtas kam karda dar saʙ doxil mekunad va saʙro meafzojad. Va Alloh ʙa har ci dar dilhost, az nek jo ʙad ogoh ast

Ba Allohu pajomʙaras Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam imon ʙijovared va az on ci ki Alloh sumoro dar on conisin soxtaast az molhojaton, dar rohi U xarc kuned. Pas ej odamon, kasone az sumo, ki imon ovardaand va az molhojason dar rohi Alloh xarc kardaand, ʙarojason savoʙi ʙuzurgest

Va sumoro ci sudaast, ki ʙa Alloh imon nameovared va ʙa sari'ati U amal namekuned va hol on ki pajomʙar sumoro ʙa on da'vat mekunad, ki ʙa Parvardigoraton imon ʙijovared va agar mu'min ʙosed, ʙa rosti Alloh az sumo pajmonatonro giriftaast

Ust on Allohe, ki ʙar ʙandai xud Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam ojoti ravsanro az Qur'on nozil mekunad, to sumoro az torikii kufr ʙa rusnoii imon ʙerun ovarad. Va haroina, Alloh ʙa sumo dar ʙerun ovardanaton az toriki ʙa sui rusnoi, hatman, musfiqu mehruʙon ast va sumoro ʙa nekutarin savoʙ podos medihad

Va caro dar rohi Alloh nafaqa namequned va hol on ki az oni Alloh ast merosi osmonhovu zamin? Az mijoni sumo onon, ki pes az fath sudani Makka nafaqa kardaand va ʙa kuffor cang kardaand, ʙo onon, ki ʙa'd az fath nafaqa kardaand va ʙa kuffor cang kardaand, dar acru savoʙ ʙaroʙar nestand. Daracahoi onon (guruhi avval) ʙolotar ast, az onhoe, ki ʙa'd az fath cang va nafaqa kardaand. Va Alloh har jak az du guruhro va'dai nek (cannat) medihad. Va Alloh ʙa har kore, ki mekuned, ogoh ast va cize ʙar U pusida nest
Kist, ki Allohro qarzi neku (ja'ne, dar rohi Alloh sadaqai ʙe minnat) dihad, ʙa on umed, ki to acru savoʙi onro ʙarojas candon ʙaroʙar zijod kunad va uro podosi neku ʙosad va on cannat ast

Ruze, ki mardoni mu'minu zanoni mu'minro meʙini, ki nurason pesopesi onon dar samti rostason meravad. Dar on ruz sumoro ʙasorat ʙod ʙa ʙihisthoe, ki dar on darjoho ravon ast va dar on covidon xohed mond va in komjoʙii ʙuzurgest ʙaroi sumo dar oxirat

Ruze mardoni munofiqu zanoni munofiq ʙa kasone, ki imon ovardaand, megujand: «Ba mo nigoh kuned, to az nuraton ravsani girem!» Faristagon ʙarojason tamasxurona gujand: «Ba aqiʙ ʙa dunjo ʙozgarded va az on co nur ʙitalaʙed!» Ongoh mijoni onho devore zada mesavad, ki ʙar on devor dare ʙosad, daruni on ki ru ʙa mu'minon ast rahmat ʙosadu ʙeruni on ki ru ʙa munofiqon ast, azoʙ ast

Va munofiqon onhoro (ja'ne, mu'minonro) nido dihand, ki ojo mo dar dunjo ʙo sumo hamroh naʙudem va misli sumo iʙodat mekardem? Mu'minon ʙarojason megujand: «Bale, ammo sumo xudro ʙa nifoqu ma'sijat dar ʙalo afkanded va ʙa margi pajomʙar va noʙudii musalmonon intizori karded va ʙa ruzi az nav zinda sudani ʙa'di murdan dar sak ʙuded va orzuhoi dunjo sumoro ʙifireft, to on goh ki farmoni Alloh (acal) darrasid va fireʙgarii sajton dar farmonʙardori ʙa Alloh fireʙaton dod

Pas imruz az hec jake az sumo munofiqon fidjae (ivaze) girifta namesavad, to xudro az azoʙi Alloh nacot dihad va na fidja girifta mesavad az kasone, ki kofir sudand. "Cojgohaton otas ast. Otas jovar va sarparasti sumost va ci ʙad sarancomest!»

Ojo ʙaroi on kasone, ki imon ʙa Alloh va rasulas ovardaand, vaqti on narasidaast, ki dilhojason dar ʙaroʙari jodi Alloh va sunidani suxani haq (Qur'on), ki nozil sudaast, narm gardad? Va niz monandi kasone (ja'ne, jahudu nasoro) naʙosand, ki pes az in Qur'on ʙa onho kitoʙ doda sudaaast va ruzgor ʙar onho daroz omad, kalomi Allohro taʙdil dodand, ongoh dilhojason saxt sud va ʙisjore az onho fosiqonand

Bidoned, ki haroina, Alloh ʙa ʙoron zaminro pas az murdanas zinda mekunad. Incunin qodir hast ʙar zinda gardondani murdaho dar ruzi qijomat va qodir hast dilhoi saxtro narm gardonad. Ba tahqiq, Mo ojotro ʙarojaton ʙa ravsani ʙajon kardem, to in ki sumo xirad varzed

Haroina, Alloh ʙa mardoni sadaqadihanda va zanoni sadaqadihanda va onhoe, ki ʙa nijati xolis ʙa Alloh qarzi neku medihand, candon ʙaroʙar zijod ʙarojason podos doda mesavad va onon podosi garonqadr dorand va on cannat ast

Va kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va pajomʙaronas imon ovardaand va mijoni hec jake az pajomʙaronas farqe nanihodand, onho siddiqonand. Va sahidon dar nazdi Parvardigorason hastand. Baroi onhost podosason va nurason ruzi qijomat. Va onhoe, ki kofir sudand va ojoti Moro duruƣ sumoridand, na ʙarojason podos va na nur ast, ʙalki onho sohiʙoni cahannamand

Bidoned, ki ej mardum, dar haqiqat zindagii incahoni ʙozivu ʙehudagist, ki ʙa on ʙadanho ʙozi mekunand va dilho sargarm mesavand va orois ast, ki xudro ʙa on zinnat medihand va mijoni sumo faxr kardanu afzuncui dar molhovu farzandon ʙa monandi ʙoronest, ki ruidanihojas kisovarzonro dar taaccuʙ ovarad. Sipas on gijoh paƶmurda mesavad, pas meʙini, ki zard gastaast, sipas xasu xosok sudaast va dar oxirat ʙaroi kofiron azoʙi saxt ast va ʙaroi axli imon omurzisi Alloh va xusnudii Ust. Va zindagii dunjo ʙaroi kase, ki oxiratasro faromus kardaast, cuz mato'e fireʙanda cizi digare nest

Ej mardum, ʙaroi rasidan ʙa saʙaʙhoi omurzisi Parvardigoraton ʙa vositai tavʙai nasuh va duri az gunoh va ʙa ʙihiste, ki vase'ii on monandi vase'ii osmonhovu zamin ast, ʙar jakdigar musoʙiqa kuned. In ʙihist ʙaroi kasone muhajjo sudaast, ki ʙa Allohu pajomʙaronas imon ovardaand. In ʙaxsoisest az coniʙi Alloh, ki ʙa har kas ʙixohad medihad va Alloh sohiʙi ʙaxsoise ʙuzurg ast. (In ojat dalel ast; ki ʙe ʙaxsois va rahmati Alloh va amali soleh hec kas ʙa ʙihist vorid namesavad)
Hec musiʙate dar zamin va na dar conaton narasad, magar pes az on ki onro ʙijovarem dar kitoʙe (Lavhi Mahfuz) navista sudaast. Begumon in amr ʙar Alloh oson ast

In ʙar on xotir ast, ki to ʙar on ci ki dar dunjo az dastaton meravad, anduhgin maʙosed va ʙa on ci ʙa dastaton meojad, sodmoni nakuned. (Ja'ne, faxr va takaʙʙur nakuned) Va Alloh hec mutakaʙʙiri xudsitojandaro dust nadorad

Onho (mutakaʙʙiron), ki dar adoi zakoti molhoi xud ʙuxl mevarzand va dar rohi Alloh onhoro xarc namekunand va mardumro ʙa ʙuxl mefarmojand. Va har ki az to'ati Alloh ruj megardonad, ʙa cuz xud kasero zarar namerasonad. Pas ʙidonad, ki ʙegumon Alloh az tamomi xalqas ʙenijoz va sutudaast. Urost tamomi sifathoi naku

Hamono Mo pajomʙaronamonro ʙo dalelhoi ravsan firistodem va ʙo onho kitoʙro ʙa ahkomu sari'athojas va tarozuro niz nozil kardem, to mardum ʙajni jakdigar ʙa adolat amal kunand va ohanro, ki dar on nerui saxt va manfi'athoi digare ʙaroi mardum hast, furu firistodem, to Alloh ʙidonad va ʙuʙinad dar olami voqe' ci kase nodida Uro va pajomʙaronasro jori mekunad. Alʙatta, Alloh tavono ast, notavon karda namesavad, piruzmand ast, maƣluʙ karda namesavad

Va hamono Mo Nuhu Iʙrohimro ʙa sui qavmason ʙa pajomʙari firistodem va dar mijoni farzandonason nuʙuvvat va kitoʙ nihodem. Pas az mijoni onho ʙa'zeason hidojatjoftagon ʙudand, vale ʙisjore az onho fosiqand

Boz az pai onho Nuhu Iʙrohim pajomʙaroni xudro firistodem. Va Iso iʙni Marjamro az pasi onho firistodem va ʙa u Incilro dodem va dar dili pajravonas mehruʙoniju ʙaxsiis qaror dodem. Va rahʙonijate, ki xud uro pajdo karda ʙudand. Mo onro ʙarojason farz nakarda ʙudem, ammo dar on xusnudii Alloh mecustand, vale haqqi onro ʙa co naguzoridand. Mo az mijoni onho kasonero, ki imon ʙa Allohu pajomʙaronas ovarda ʙudand, muvofiq ʙa imonason podos dodem, vale ʙisjore az onho fosiqonand

Ej kasone, ki ʙa Alloh imon ovardaed, az Alloh ʙitarsed ʙo ʙa co ovardani amrhojas va dur ʙudan az man'kardahojas va ʙa pajomʙaras imon ʙijovared, to sumoro az rahmati xes du ʙaroʙar muzd ʙidihad. Va sumoro nure ato kunad, to ʙa on roh raved va ʙaroi sumo gunohonatonro meomurzad. Va Alloh ʙo ʙandagonas omurzandavu mehruʙon ast

to ahli kitoʙ (onon, ki ʙa Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam imon naovardaand), ʙidonand, ki onho ʙar cize az fazli Alloh qodir nestand va haroina, in fazl va ato ʙa dasti Ust, ki ʙa har ki xohad, arzoni medorad va Alloh doroi ʙaxsoisi azime ast
